description.html:
I'm not sure what frequency the state machine is running but upon checking the cloudsim-sim key in redis-server there are few hundred entries in the back-log and a giant never-ending state string containing outputs of the simulation process. Starting node gives a out of memory error. By default node is allowed to use 1.5GB of memory so the data we have already exceeds that amount.

This PR temporarily disables logging stderr / stdcout to database.

@preyna ptal

title.raw: Disable saving stderr stdout output to database
title.html: Disable saving stderr stdout output to database

title: Disable saving stderr stdout output to database
